member.name: QACONTROL.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: QACONTROL.dwMiscStatus
member.summary: The control's miscellaneous status bits that can also be returned by . See for more information.

member.name: QACONTROL.dwViewStatus
member.summary: The control's view status that can also be returned by . See for more information.

member.name: QACONTROL.dwEventCookie
member.summary: A unique identifier for control-defined events.

member.name: QACONTROL.dwPropNotifyCookie
member.summary: A unique identifier for control-defined properties.

member.name: QACONTROL.dwPointerActivationPolicy
member.summary: The control's activation policy that can also be returned by . If all the bits of dwPointerActivationPolicy are set, then the IPointerInactive interface may not be supported. The container should to obtain the interface pointer in the standard manner.
